mapper.select: select b.log_id as "logId", b.file_name as "fileName", count(*) as "num", sum(a.index_data) as "sum", e.name as "city", b.user_id as "userId", decode(a.action, null, 'N', 'Y', 'Y') as "action", b.export_desc as "remark" from Rpt_Import_Data_ICT a, EXT_IMPORT_LOG b, aweb_user d, aweb_organization e where a.acct_month = #{month} and a.log_id = b.log_id and b.user_id = #{userId} and b.type = #{type} and d.id = b.user_id and e.data = b.latn_id and e.type = 'local_net' group by a.action, b.log_id, b.file_name, e.name, b.user_id, b.export_desc order by a.action desc
